data.title: Charles City County, Virginia Population 2024
data.text:
Charles City County, Virginia 's estimated 2024 population is 6,652 with a growth rate of 0.64% in the past year according to the most recent United States census data. Charles City County, Virginia is the 125th largest county in Virginia. The 2010 population was 7,255 and has seen a growth of -8.31% since that time.

12.47%

Overall Poverty Rate

12.88%

Male Poverty Rate

12.06%

Female Poverty Rate

Poverty in Charles City County, Virginia

The race most likely to be in poverty in Charles City County, Virginia is Asian , with 23.08% below the poverty level.

The race least likely to be in poverty in Charles City County, Virginia is Native , with 3.37% below the poverty level.

The poverty rate among those that worked full-time for the past 12 months was 1.64% . Among those working part-time, it was 16.4% , and for those that did not work, the poverty rate was 19.81% .
